title: ISic001175. Halaesa honours Diogenes Lapiron, son of Diogenes
body:
1[θ]ε̣οῖς πᾶσι
2[ὁ] δᾶμος τῶν Ἀλαισίνων
3[Δι]ογένην Διογένεος
4Λαπίρωνα
5[εὐ]εργεσίας ἕνεκεν

1[.].ΟΙΣΠΑΣΙ
2[.]ΔΑΜΟΣΤΩΝΑΛΑΙΣΙΝΩΝ
3[..]ΟΓΕΝΗΝΔΙΟΓΕΝΕΟΣ
4ΛΑΠΙΡΩΝΑ
5[..]ΕΡΓΕΣΙΑΣΕΝΕΚΕΝ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Prag from autopsy

English translation

Jonathan Prag

The people of the Halaesini (dedicate) to all the gods (a statue of) Diogenes Lapiron son of Diogenes on account of his beneficence.

Italian translation

Maria Egizia Felice

Il popolo degli alesini (dedica) agli dei tutti (una statua di) Diogene Lapiro figlio di Diogene per la sua beneficenza.

commentary

The inscription has the form of a standard honorific dedication for an individual, and there are several similar texts from the area of the agora at Halaesa. Several other individuals are known from Halaesa with the second name ‘Lapiron’ (in three other inscriptions, ISic001176, ISic000800, ISic003571 and from Cicero, In Verrem 2.2.19-28), and the name Diogenes is recorded a second time in the same family in ISic001176 - in theory this could be the same individual (see Facella 2006: 229-241 on the family). The name Lapiron is otherwise only attested at Locri (SEG 32.1018), although the phenomenon of such second names is common in Hellenistic Sicily (O. Masson, Onomastica Graeca Selecta (2000), vol. 2, 379-86). This block is most likely to be the base, or part of the base, for a statue or some other object dedicated to ‘all the gods’ in honour of Diogenes.

bibliography

  • Gualtherus (no date) no.138
  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] 46 no.298 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • Muratori 1740 554 no.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001395
  • Castelli 1753 143-145 no.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002086
  • Castelli 1769 44 no.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084
  • Castelli 1784 48 cl.V no.17 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083
  • Franz 1853 5595 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001250
  • Kaibel 1890 353 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • Hoffmann 1904 5201 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000817
  • Manni Piraino 1973 127 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000531
  • Prestianni Giallombardo 1993 tav.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001659
  • Facella 2006 230 n.30 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002013
  • Prestianni Giallombardo 2012 178 fig.157 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001357
  • Prag and Tigano 2017 no.42 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002630
